name: @randy.tarampi/letter
description: A cover letter generator for www.randytarampi.ca

scripts.build: npm run build:gulp && npm run build:babel
scripts.prepare: if [ -z "$IS_PUBLISHING" ]; then npm run build; fi;
scripts.prepack: if [ -z "$RELEASE" ] && [ -z "$CI" ]; then NODE_ENV=prd npm run build; fi; if [ ! -d "./dist" ] && [ ! -d "./build" ]; then exit 74; fi;
scripts.start:server: npm run kill:server; node ./server.js & echo $! > /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid; echo "Started server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid";
scripts.kill:server: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid ]; then echo "Killing server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.letter.server.pid; fi;
scripts.letter: NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") gulp -LLLL --color letter
scripts.cover: rm -rf coverage/ .nyc_output/; NODE_ENV=test nyc gulp -LLLL --color test
